item.title: Peru Roads: The Route to the Stars v0.8.5 1.53 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | December 4, 2024

Peru Roads: The Route to the Stars v0.8.5 1.53 ETS2

The mod is now compatible with Eurotruck Simulator 2 version 1.53.

List of changes for this version: (version: 0.8.5):
– Compatibility with Eurotruck Simulator 2 version 1.53.

Upcoming changes:
– Addition of the cities: – South: Nazca, – North: Chimbote, – East: Jauja
– New models of interesting elements such as markets, etc.

Known bugs:
– Sometimes when dropping off passengers, at the time of parking it does not recognize that you are already in the correct position or the message to skip parking and drop off automatically does not appear. A possible solution is to use camera zero and Ctrl+F9 to reset the position of the invisible load.
Peru Roads is a mod for the game Euro Truck Simulator 2 which allows you to travel along the roads of Peru, in addition to getting to know both the landscapes and the cities of this country and its customs.
The Euro Truck Simualtor 2 version supported by this mod is: 1.53

The mod requires the following map DLC to work: “Going East!”, “Scandinavia”, “Vive la France !”, “Italia”, “Beyond the Baltic Sea” and “Road to the Black Sea”.
– New city: Callao
– The entire Callao area was completely redesigned and became an independent city.
– Guardia Chalaca and Morales Duárez avenues added.
– Faucett, Néstor Gambeta, Argentina, Oscar R. Benavides (Colonial) and Venezuela avenues were completed and left as close as possible to reality.
– Added Pearl Oval, Garibaldi Square, Obelisk Oval, Centennial Oval.
– Redesign of the Canta Callao oval.
– Partial redesign of Universitaria and Tomás Valle avenues.
– Redesign from scratch of the port of Callao and the Jorge Chávez airport.
– Numerous points of interest added.
– Several companies were added to Callao, including loading and unloading points at the port and airport, as well as the Pampilla refinery.
– New city: Casma.
– New companies were added in the city of Lima, one on Argentina Avenue and the other on Universitaria Avenue.
– Deactivated companies in the city of Ica were corrected.
– The return to the north in the Chancay area was improved.
– Weighings in the Andean area have been improved and are better integrated with the road.
– Improved the menu map with textures at higher resolution and higher definition.
– Added new retroreflective road studs.
– Several textures were redone due to the graphics engine changes in version 1.53.
– Vegetations that disappeared if you reached one end of them were partially fixed, an error that appeared with 1.53.
– Arrangement of various floating vegetation and holes in the ground.
– Continuation of changing obsolete prefabs for updated ones.
– New advertising and business models.

Credits: Peru Roads

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | December 4, 2024

DAF XF 106 480 WEEDA TRANSPORT 1.52-1.53.x ETS2

v14.0 features:
Adapted to ETS2 1.52-1.53.x
Better compatibility with other mods.
Corrected some problems with 3D models.
Added interior shadows feature.
Reworked u.i. shadow.
Reworked lights.
Reworked lightmasks.
Reworked lightbox.
Reworked cabin light (ONLY IN FULL VERSION).
Reworked bullbar (ONLY IN FULL VERSION).
Adjusted cabin accessories position.
Added some new cabin accessories.
Added driver.
Other minor corrections.

Credits: Cyrus, RussianGuy, Nikola trucks, Caspian Custom Team, DutchLiner, Bimo Wahyu Saputro, EVR, Schumi, Kriechbaum.

item.title: REAL AI COUNTRY SPAWNS ADD-ON for Jazzycat v21.8.5 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | December 4, 2024

REAL AI COUNTRY SPAWNS ADD-ON for Jazzycat v21.8.5 ETS2

Added real country spawns for new SCS AI cars – old and new pickup, and city crossover.
Little word about these. The crossover is clearly Peugeot 2008 II. And about pick-ups – their kind of generic car body let me use them in a little various way. They are definitely very benefitable for Middle-East or African countries, so I took them kind of as generic pickups. New one for a mix of Toyota Hilux, VW Amarok, Ford Ranger. The old one as a mix of Nissan D21 Hardbody and old Toyota Hilux. Spawns follow this idea.
– Added real country spawns for SCS Iveco Daily.
– Added real colours for new vehicles!
– Unlocked new SCS AI trailers! I have found hidden trailers probably being prepared for the Greece DLC. Both are activated in and pulled by various cars.

This add-on sets all cars to REAL SPAWNS BY COUNTRY they appear in. Every country has custom setting of all cars spawning, according to the real traffic and car brands popularity. Spawns follow also country’s wealth, which means no more luxury cars on every corner in less wealthy countries like Romania or Macedonia for example. I studied those countries using sells statistics and dashcam videos from most countries, this is actually result of several years of work and contant improving. I had this for my private use, but I decided to share it publicly now.

Add-on also fixes spawning of cars in left-drive countries, like United Kingdom or Ireland, with wrong-positioned steering wheel and driver – by disallowing cars that don’t have model for these countries. There is an exception for vans with UK skins, which would be missing on UK roads otherwise.
Countries with spawns set are all SCS countries. Add-on also supports and set spawns for these map mods: Promods, Promods Middle-East, Promods Great Steppe, Road to Asia and Road To Africa (by Terramaps), Java Road Revolution map (= Indonesia map), Maghreb map mod (North part of Africa), Heart of Africa and Horn of Africa maps.
This add-on also includes lots of fixes and new features:
Wheel changes, real colours and generic colour palette, trailers variety, disable bad models of cars from traffic, texture fixes etc. For more details check my thread on SCS forum!
This version is only compatible with Jazzycat’s AI traffic pack v21.8.5 for ETS2 version 1.53.
You need to download Jazzycat’s AI traffic pack in order to work! Place my add-on ABOVE the Jazzycats’s AI pack in the mod manager!
Enjoy realistic traffic.

Credits: Egon, Jazzycat, SCS

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD
